Reclusive artist Victor Clare (Mike Raven) turns his secluded Cornish studio into a deadly gallery, where his obsession with "preserving beauty" leads to chilling creations. As art dealer John Davies (James Bolam) uncovers Victor's twisted secrets, a sinister game of survival unfolds amidst betrayal, mystery, and eerie sculptures.

sources.description: A deranged sculptor who creates particularly lifelike bronze sculptures edges to the brink of artistic success when the art market latches onto one of his masterpieces. No one realises that he is a maniac who uses real women as moulds for his sculptures, but lurking inside his latest work is a live¬† model hell-bent on avenging her submersion in liquid bronze.

sources.title: Crucible Of Terror 1971
sources.description: An obsessed sculptor kills a young woman to make a perfect bronze sculpture of her. Years later at his secluded home a number of people become trapped in a web of revenge, murder and horror.
